question: Where does the ventral (uncrossed) corticospinal tract terminate in the spinal cord?
optionOne: Medial motor column of anterior horn of same side
optionTwo: Medial motor column of anterior horn of opposite side
optionThree: Medial motor column of anterior horn of both sides
optionFour: Lateral motor column of anterior horn of opposite side
optionFive: Lateral motor column of anterior horn of both sides
